sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './CheckoutProduct.css' import {useContext} from 'react' import CommerceContext from './context/commerce-context' function CheckoutProduct({ key, title, image, pricing, clickToRemove, }) { const {qtyCount,incCount,decCount} = useContext(CommerceContext) var count = 1 return (
{title} $ {pricing * qtyCount} {qtyCount}
) } export default CheckoutProduct
